Text:
will it auto update after this install?.
or is it that when a newer ver is out then i have to look and download for another client?
thanks
You will have to use the pylotro client and click patch. It takes a bit for the update, but it eventually finishes. I think instructions for this are in the readme.
Bumped upload speed up a bit so yall can get it a little faster. Dont have much bandwidth to share to begin with but hey....its the thought that counts right?
